title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, some actions are in the context menu while others are not. It is not clear to users why this distinction is made, and it is not acceptable to force users to switch views to access certain actions. We should distribute the actions in a more logical and consistent manner.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu.
